qas.question: What is London's most popular athletic sport?
How many of the football clubs in the Premier League are based in London?
When did the Chelsea Football Club win the UEFA Champions League title?
How many professional football clubs call London their home?
Besides the Arsenal, Chelsea, and Tottenham football clubs, how many London-based football club have won a national league titie?

context: London's most popular sport is <a0_0>football<a0_0/> and it has <a3_0>fourteen<a3_0/> League football clubs, including <a1_0>five<a1_0/> in the Premier League: Arsenal, Chelsea, Crystal Palace, Tottenham Hotspur, and West Ham United. Among other professional teams based in London include Fulham, Queens Park Rangers, Millwall and Charlton Athletic. In <a2_0>May 2012<a2_0/>, Chelsea became the first London club to win the UEFA Champions League. Aside from Arsenal, Chelsea and Tottenham, <a4_0>none<a4_0/> of the other London clubs have ever won the national league title.
